sect2.title: Introduction to Control Center
sect2.para: The Control Center package contains the GNOME settings managers.

sect2.title: Installation of Control Center
sect2.para: Install Control Center by running the following commands:
This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/lib/control-center: This switch puts libexec files in $GNOME_PREFIX/lib/control-center instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec.
--localstatedir=/var/lib: This switch puts scrollkeeper files in /var/lib/scrollkeeper instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/var/scrollkeeper.
--enable-aboutme: Enables building the gnome-about-me capplet. Evolution Data Server must be installed to use this parameter.
